item.title: YUME 4
item.description:
About This Game

Game background

As the fourth part of the YUME series, this is still a story centered on Chen Xi, but the perspective is unfolded by you, a hot emerging director.
As the most outstanding young director today, you are handsome and rich, and you are often approached by unknown starlets or girls who aspire to be in the entertainment industry...
So what, you still named Chen Xi as the heroine of the new movie, please! Chen Xi is your favorite female star since you entered the entertainment industry. She is really awesome.
When I entered the set, I unexpectedly discovered that she has been losing energy recently and kept mumbling about "Menghan".
How can outsiders understand her distress...

Gameplay

Chen Xi and the memory of her previous life once again split into two forms, one on each side of the maze. How can she obtain the memory of her previous life? ?
YUME 4 is a maze-breaking game, in which Chen Xi moves in the opposite direction to her previous life. Players need to use keyboard control to reach the designated position to enter the next level!
There will be many dangers to stop your progress, be careful not to get Chen Xi injured!
The gameplay of the YUME series has been updated again. You can interact with characters in free mode to get different reactions and favorability~

item.title: Spellslinger
item.description:
About This Game

Harness the power of the Elements and gather Spells to defend yourself against Hordes of Enemies!



In this game, you are a Wizard, trapped in a castle, as magical creatures are attacking you from every side.
The only way to survive is to fight back with a vast array of different Spells. Spells are cast automatically, however, it's up to you to find the best Combination!



Spell Traits:
It's not only about getting the strongest Spells, it's about finding a Combination, that will grant you even more Power.



Every Spell belongs to one Element and one School.

Elements grant Unique bonuses to their respective Spells.
Want to Freeze your Enemies? Burn them to Ashes? Or make them Explode into more Projectiles?
Gather Spells with the same Element to activate these Traits and make them stronger by getting more of the same Element.

Knowing Spells of the same School will give you the power of their creators.
Harnessing the power of Fairies will give you regenerative abilites, or you can become as strong as a Dragon.
Activating the Phoenix School will grow your power over time and give you the ability to revive.

Gameplay:
The controls of this game are very simple. You can walk and you can jump. Spells and abilities get activated automatically.
You need to survive 20 waves of an onslaught of enemies, that get stronger every wave. Later waves introduce new enemies and there's a big threat in the final wave.

So you walk around casting spells on enemies that will drop loot upon defeat. Gather gems to buy new spells and items to become stronger.
Enemies might occasionally drop an item which you can take or sell at the end of a wave.
Sometimes enemies also drop Heal Orbs, which heal you upon collecting them.

Occasionally Chests will spawn, that you can open by simply touching them. They contain loot, but pay close attention, because not every chest is dormant.

In the shop you can view your current Spells in the top left, where you can also decide to buy new empty Spellbooks. In order to learn a new unique Spell you need at least one empty Spellbook. Buying a Spell that you already have, will add 1 experience point to it. 3 Spells of the same kind will make a level 2 Spell and 9 of a kind make a level 3 Spell, increasing not only the Power, but also giving unique bonuses to certain Spells.

Every Spell has Base Power, Scalings (indicated by the respective Symbol in the Description) and the "Damage" stat acts as a final percentual Modifier for all Player Damage sources. (1 Damage = 101% of original Damage).

In the Shop items can be bought, rerolled or locked (so they reappear next wave). Prices will increase with higher wave numbers.

item.title: Cosmic Collapse
item.description:
About This Game

Physics based planet matching!


It is time to tidy up the solar system. Can't have all these planets laying around.

  • Shove planets into each other to make bigger planets
  • No stress, take your time
  • Like Suika Game but more forgiving and extra features
  • Play strategically to trigger insane combos
  • Earn missiles to get out of tricky situations
  • Totally accurate simulation of celestial bodies

Tips and tricks

  • Use smaller planets to nudge bigger ones
  • You get more points for chaining collapses. Try to line up planets in the correct order before collapsing them all
  • Keep it tidy, lots of small planets will make the end game difficult
  • Use your missiles wisely, they can be a total game changer

item.title: Medieval Revenge
item.description:
About This Game

A gripping mini-game set in medieval England, where the life of a farmer's son takes an unexpected turn with the Viking raids on England. As the family faces tragedy, the son swears revenge, embarking on a challenging adventure where your strength, persuasiveness, and ruthlessness depend on the cards you choose.

-Over 100 card choices

-Interactive drawings based on your decisions

-Titles based on your choices

Start your adventure as a farmer striving to survive in the harsh medieval times, seeking revenge!

item.title: ring of the devil
item.description:
About This Game

This is a fighting game.



The map design is fantastic.



Adjusting gameplay and operations based on the map greatly enhances the gaming experience.



The aesthetics of physical stimulation and violence in boxing, simple yet not simple game controls, and rich and innovative game mechanics have overwhelmed other fighting games, allowing players to quickly get started while leaving ample room for freedom.



Players can make rich combinations according to their own needs to obtain a better gaming experience.



It inherits classic combat elements well, allowing players to enjoy intense battles and feel the tense atmosphere of life and death in the game. With its superb production level, it meets the player's requirements for a refreshing sense of attack and skill release.

item.title: Unrestricted Pest Control
item.description:
About This Game

Unrestricted Pest Control is a top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements and a unique room/floor system. As an exterminator, you step into a nuclear research facility to fix its bug problems with your extensive solution methods.

Insects are famous for their adaptation and survival skills. A small push of radioactivity makes things a little bit complicated. They have outgrown themselves, gained new skills, and mutated distinctively. You must use your weapons wisely if you want to live.



You will have different skills that can be gained by defeating after bosses, but remember, you can use only one of them. Get a shield, slaying hoops, or a grenade to destroy everything. Choose the skill that serves you best.



With the unique room and floor system, this game demands strategizing your path. You are starting on the ground floor and your main goal is to reach the top floor. You must survive every room and reach the floor boss to be able to reach the upper floor. Be careful if you die, you will go back to square one. But don’t worry, once you unlock a floor, it stays unlocked. This allows you to reach the upper floor from the very first room. You can go final boss directly in theory :)



Clear every room to reach the bosses. Defeat the bosses to reach the upper floors. Clean the whole facility to reach ultimate satisfaction.

item.title: Tanks Etc.
item.description:
About This Game

Tanks Etc. is an arcade that offers both cooperative and competitive gameplay - perfect for couch gaming with friends. Set in a futuristic world, the game lets you control sophisticated tanks and mechs in adrenaline-fueled battles. It offers familiar modes like deathmatch, capture the flag, and king of the hill, each demanding different strategies, from individual combat prowess to team coordination.
Tanks Etc. also creatively reinvents classic games; for example, it transforms hot potato into a tense, tank-based challenge and turns hide and seek into a strategic game of stealth and pursuit. These innovative twists add depth and excitement to the traditional arcade experience.
With its range of game modes catering to various playstyles, from fast-paced action to strategic team play, Tanks Etc. is a versatile and engaging game for players who love cooperative camaraderie and competitive thrills.

item.title: Story in the Dream World 3 -Sinister Island's Mysterious Mist-
item.description:
About This Game

The prelude to the third story...

Yeonseul and Hyeyoon met various water gods and spirit creatures...
Yeonseul fainted for a moment, then woke up. Since Enter Sangbian Island a rather heavy mission and identification of the cause, the duel was somewhat unreasonable.
“Except for the god of the sea, everything was fine in its own way.”
"Shinjike gave me a sense of being elegant and lonely somewhere, and Hae-gwi seemed like a gentle man with strong strength in a rough battlefield."
“Of course, both of you are trustworthy.”
“But how to help... I can't help but feel anxious because I don't know what will happen if I go to Sangbian Island...”
Then, in a daze, I looked towards the shore from inside the shrine. Under the deep blue sky, the moon was shining brightly, and the seawater reflected the moonlight softly.
“There is a moon as big as that in this place... I like it because it is moderately bright and not dazzling.”
The tremendous tension and anxiety before the big event calmed down little by little while watching the moon and listening to the sound of the sea.
Hyeyoon also fainted and got up. The shrine where Hyeyoon is located is deeper inland than Yeonseul's shrine, so the seawater is not visible. There is only a thin stream.
“Imoogi..? pal?"
I was still in the temple, dazed and dazed, as if it was still sudden.
After a daze, I came out of the shrine and looked at the moon.
The soft moonlight and the sounds of insects and streams seemed to calm Hyeyoon's heart.
"Shinjike-nim... Hae-gwi-nim..."
“Am I the right person for the job… I don’t know…”
Hye-yoon lacks confidence. But someday someone has to do it. Besides, there are colleagues who will come together.
"okay. There was also Yeon-seul... Would you think that the grace I received was repaid with help? I'm glad I don't get sick...”
It was as if the various environments around her were comforting and encouraging Hyeyoon, who thought of herself as weak. I can't help but feel anxious...

How to play the game
1. Common Mode
Avoid and shoot down the attacks of various henchmen that appear for a certain amount of time whenever you enter each chapter!
After a certain amount of time, the boss comes out, talks to the player, and starts a duel with the player.
Beat the boss to enter the next chapter or view the endings!

2. Boss Rush Mode
It is a mode that can be unlocked by breaking it once, regardless of the number of times (within a limited number of times) connecting the normal mode to the difficulty level.
There are no henchmen spawning in this mode, and no dialogue with the boss.
And, it comes out a little stronger than the boss in normal mode!
Only, if you duel with the boss and beat the boss, you go to the next chapter or the game ends right away!
(There is no separate ending in this mode.)

3. Achievements
The fun of clearing the 23 achievements in the game has also been added!

Game control keys
(If there is no separate guide key, the key will be used.)
Back: X, Esc
Menu/Weapon Selection: Z, Enter
Menu/character movement: arrow keys (if you press Shift for a character, it moves slowly)
Fire weapon, talk to boss: Z
Use Bomb, skip boss dialogue: X
Fire special bullets (when the gauge is maxed out): C
Pause menu: Esc

item.title: Ghost Only !
item.description:
About This Game

For the Resurrection of the Ancient demon!

It's a real-time strategy game where you become a ghost, defeat heroes with skulls, and resurrect the ancient demon.

Save the Altar!

The altar is a place for the resurrection of the ancient demon.
The heroes will break into the ghost's estate to deter it.
Control the skulls and bring the ancient demon resurrect safely.

Control the Skulls!

Wake up the already dead skulls.
Join forces with the skulls.
Learn black magic and regain skull's memory to strengthen your skulls.

item.title: Illegal Mahjong
item.description:
About This Game


Yuri, the former heiress of a company, finds her father's business bankrupt.
To repay the debts, Yuri must compete in mahjong and continue to win.
Can Yuri truly defeat her formidable opponents?


In this game, you control Yuri and compete in mahjong against various opponents.

  • Mahjong skills can be utilized

item.title: French Fries Pusher Friends
item.description:
About This Game

For video creators and streamers
STP WORKS permits the use of our games for video distribution to YouTube and other sites, and monetization through video distribution platform partner programs.


Game Overview
Do you love French fries? Then this game is for you! A game where you push out fries with French fries to create a set of a burger, fries, and a drink. The goal is to fulfill as many orders as you can before you run out of HP. It's a challenge you wouldn't want to miss!


Stick to sound effects
We have recorded the actual sounds of fries from a famous fast food joint to use as sound effects in the game. You can enjoy a realistic and immersive potato sound experience.


Online Multiplayer
Enjoy both random and friend matching. You can experience a once in a lifetime meet in a random match, get excited with inside jokes in friend matching, and of course, it's also possible to play solo. Play as you prefer, and you can play with up to 4 people at the same time.


Leaderboard
Compete for scores with French fries lovers all over the world.

Upgrade
You can enhance various abilities using the money earned from playing the game.

item.title: Cryptis
item.description:
About This Game

Reawakened In Desolation...


Awaken amidst a desolate realm, your last memory being a life far removed from this nightmare. Embark on a journey of relentless violence, navigating through hordes of bloodthirsty undead. What sinister force has brought you to this place? Plunge into a tale shrouded in shadows and unveil the chilling truth.

Next-Gen Visuals Meet a Retro Aesthetic

Built in the mesmerizing Unreal Engine 5 and harnessing the cutting-edge capabilities of Nanite and Lumen, Cryptis immerses you in a haunting world where retro-inspired designs meet breathtakingly realistic lighting.

Dynamic and Diverse Gameplay

No two encounters are the same. Your journey will see you wielding an array of weapons, tools, and abilities that allow for varied approaches to confrontations, ensuring a fresh and thrilling experience with every battle.

Embrace the chaos, slaughter your bloodthirsty adversaries, and overcome the darkness. The very fabric of this realm quivers at your presence. Leave nothing left standing.

Welcome to Cryptis. Your nightmare has just begun...

item.title: Sleigh Strikers
item.description:
About This Game


In Sleigh Strikers Santa's elves have engineered the ultimate gift-giving gadget: the Present Launcher 1225. With the reindeer missing, it's up to you to deliver the goods in a blitz of festive fury. Race through 10 increasingly challenging levels, each faster and more frantic than the last, and bring back the missing reindeer to save Christmas. Ready, aim, unwrap!
Challenge the rest of the world at your present delivering skills and deliver your way to the top of the Global Leaderboards.


Ready to Sleigh? the frosty fun ramps up with each level. Your mission: zip presents or coal down chimneys, scoring points for precision. But beware, a merry mix-up between the naughty and nice lists will cost you! Aim like an elf on expresso to snag those high scores and stars. While it's all jingle bells and joy to start, mastering the leaderboard is a craft only the most dedicated Santa's helpers will perfect.

item.title: BUZZ
item.description:
About This Game

BUZZ is a challenging 2D platformer with fast, fluid gameplay.



Slice through the void to gain momentum



Rebound off anomalies to reverse momentum



Surf the goo to maintain momentum

Features:


  • Accessible two button controls makes it easy to pickup
  • 50 Levels
  • Optional extra tricky collectible on every level
  • Replay ghosts, leader boards and personal bests
  • Full controller support
  • Dynamic Soundtrack

item.title: Orienteering Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

🧭 Orienteering Simulator 🧭

Version: v.1.1 Martinsflue (Release)


🔰 - Learn how to orientate yourself in this friendly environment. In "Find-Posts"-Mode, you will have to find your target using a compass and a map, while in "Orienteering"-Mode, you have to pinpoint your location on the map.

🔓 Choose between multiple maps, gamemodes, weather conditions & more to create your personalized experience. Fulfill achievements to unlock new compasses that you can use during your explorations.

⬆️Update! Check out the new map "Martinsflue"! Orientate in a harsh environment containing lots of height difference, stones and winding paths. Want even more fun? Try out the Martinsflue-Extra-Map's "Stones-Only", "Contour-Lines-Only" or "Paths-Only"!

item.title: Time Glitch
item.description:
About This Game

Time Glitch invites you to immerse yourself in a short, unique blend of dungeon crawling and time manipulation. You find yourself at the end of a grand tabletop campaign, facing an undead king who wields the power of time itself. However, every defeat sends you back to the gates of the final dungeon, where your experience began.

But here's the twist – you retain your memories, particularly knowing which die yields what number. Armed with this information, guide your characters strategically through the final battle. Role dice to cast spells and launch attacks, but be cautious – the world's fate hangs in the balance, and so does the friendship among your party.

Key Features:

  • Strategic Dice Rolls: Remember the outcomes of your dice rolls to make crucial decisions. Your success hinges on choosing the correct paths and actions to overcome challenges. The game is designed to be completed in roughly 20 minutes, offering an engaging experience that fits into a short gaming session or 1 hour if you want to get all the endings.


  • Bite-sized tabletop RPG Journey: Immerse yourself in the final moments of a tabletop RPG, complete with an undead king who controls the very fabric of time.


  • 4th Wall Breaking Fun: Delight in the unique experience of playing a bite-sized tabletop RPG journey within a game. Enjoy the subtle humor and surprises as you navigate the game world and the meta-narrative.


  • Friendship and Fate: Every decision matters not only for the fate of the in-game world but also for the bonds between your characters.



Can you break the cycle, defeat the undead king, and ensure a triumphant end to your campaign? Explore the intricate blend of time travel and tabletop RPG in Time Glitch – where the past is your greatest weapon.

item.title: LASERS
item.description:
About This Game


LASERS is a free multiplayer game about surviving deadly laser mazes. Only one player can win. Will it be you?

Features

  • Dodge lasers or die trying. One wrong step will cost you your limbs
  • Online multiplayer for 1-10 players
  • Race against the clock to be the last player standing
  • Over 20 handmade levels to beat
  • Full of thick gym bros and girls to play as
  • Unlock emotes and outfits by increasing your Halo Rank
  • Dark, pounding synth music

This game was created for fun by a tiny indie studio. If you enjoy it, please show us your support and we'll continue to work on it!

item.title: Syllogism
item.description:
About This Game

Join an exciting journey through a variety of biomes, each with its own unique theme and environment. From lush tropical forests to mysterious ruins, amazing adventures and mysteries await you that will not leave you indifferent.

Explore an open world full of beautiful views and locations, and enjoy a relaxing atmosphere while immersing yourself in unique challenges that will challenge your imagination and logical thinking.

What awaits you in the game:
-36 main and 20 additional puzzles in 6 different zones, united by the main mechanics, but at the same time unique and interesting.
-An open world where you can go anywhere and also unravel the mysteries and secrets hidden in it
-Puzzles with unusual mechanics, involving the environment, the world, around you, and another puzzles
-Atmospheric soundtrack that will immerse you into the world of the game
-Themed locations, from the desert and ancient buildings to Asian gardens
-Explore every corner of this world, because every little thing matters
-Enjoy beautiful stylized graphics that will surround you with a relaxing and pleasant environment.

item.title: Reigns: Three Kingdoms
item.description:
About This Game

Inspired by the beloved Chinese epic "Romance of the Three Kingdoms," this game thrusts players into the turbulent final years of the Han dynasty. Players will encounter the many factions, wars, and heroes of the saga as they swipe through to make high-stakes decisions, team up with the right army at the right time, gain power, and more.

Discover new ways to enjoy this franchise's unique card-based swiping mechanic as you uncover the many secrets of a vast storyline, deploy strategy in turn-based battles and encounter a host of unexpected mini-games.

Features:

  • Experience a distinctive narrative told through encountering a vast variety of characters and scenarios.
  • Play dozens of quests with specific arcs, heroes to recruit, people to wed, and children to raise.
  • Recruit new heroes to fight with you in new turn-based card battles.
  • Build your own dynasty and see your political progress.
  • For the first time, take your recruits into battle against other players in online-ranked card battles.

item.title: Time Handlers
item.description:
About This Game



In Time Handlers, dive into an exhilarating cooperative adventure with a friend. Become employees of the mysterious Time Company tasked with repairing the spatio-temporal rifts that threaten the balance of time and space that manifest across different eras. Face bewildering and exciting challenges.




In this 3D puzzle game, you explore a mysterious tower filled with challenging obstacles. Each floor presents new complex puzzles that require close communication and flawless cooperation between the two players. Be creative, solve twisted riddles, and use your wits to progress.




The narrator will follow your progress in the tower, so be prepared for sharp comments and witty remarks that spice up your interactions with the game.




Your ultimate goal is to climb the tower's floors, solve all the complex puzzles, and reach the heart of the spatio-temporal rift. Only skillful puzzle-solving will allow you to restore order in the universe and mend the tears of time.




Will you succeed in solving puzzles to repair the rift that threatens time?
What are these rifts really?
What is the narrator's purpose and who is he?

Answer these questions through the different trials you will encounter!
